# Office 2016

This page is for the MSI version only. Retail editions shipped as C2R are not covered here.

Updates for amd64 only. Source: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/officeupdates/msp-files-office-2016

## Integrating into installer

Copy into the `Updates` folder

BTW: You can merge multiple office products (e. g. Pro, Visio, Publisher etc) into one DVD.
The shared files are identical, `setup.exe` will show a menu where you can select the product you want to install.

## Fixing annoyances

### Sign In Button

    reg add HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Office\16.0\Common\SignIn /v SignInOptions /t REG_DWORD /d 3 /f

### Share Button

Unfortunately, it can't be hidden completely. These commands will only disable it.

    reg add HKCU\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Office\16.0\Word\DisabledCmdBarItemsList /v TCID1 /t REG_SZ /d 26594 /f
    reg add HKCU\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Office\16.0\Excel\DisabledCmdBarItemsList /v TCID1 /t REG_SZ /d 26594 /f
    reg add HKCU\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Office\16.0\PowerPoint\DisabledCmdBarItemsList /v TCID1 /t REG_SZ /d 26594 /f
